short_description: tricolor tv is a radio & television production company based in saint petersburg, russia.
long_description: tricolor tv (триколор тв) is russia's largest direct-to-home provider based in saint-petersburg and has broadcast two hundred tv channels in the european part of russia and siberia since 2005. as of october 2014, tricolor tv provided satellite services to over fifteen million subscribers (approximately 40 000 000 viewers). according to the research of j'son and partners consulting, tricolor tv leads hdtv broadcasting in russia (39,6%). tricolor tv is the russian pioneer of uhdtv broadcasting also.
